title: Good light-HBS-A/C-16 Elmer St Cambridge- Laundry in unit
posting_body: ['Cambridge/Harvard Sq-Peabody Terrace Area 3 Bedroom 2 Bath', 'Cambridge / Riverside / Harvard Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#133895', 'Apartment Details', 'Kitchen:', 'Eat in Kitchen.', ' With dining area.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Electric Stove, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal.', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Reference:', '#133895', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Bedrooms:', '3', 'Bath:', '2', 'Location:', 'Cambridge/Riverside', 'Apartment Summary', "Modern unit as good or better than Peabody Terrace so works well for Harvard people who didn't win the lottery.", ' Very close to B-School and had fully equipped kitchen and central AC and balcony.', '  Elevator building in great Riverside location.', '  Laundry in unit!!!(Reference #133895)  **** pics and video attached are models from a similar unit in the building****', 'Features', 'Inquire about Off Street Parking.', 'Washer in unit, Dryer in unit, Cable Ready, Central.', '11 minute walk to the T.', '5 minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', 'Small Building structure, Brick architecture, on the 4th floor, GOOD SIZED square feet.', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Brandon Spellman', 'Call:', '617-855-5594', 'Please mention reference #', '133895', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
